snippet: Suburban Detroit authorities have filed first-degree murder charges against a 65-year-old woman they say slashed her son's throat and then fatally beat her 7-month-old granddaughter....

headline.print_headline: Woman Charged With Killing Her Son, Granddaughter
headline.main: Woman Charged With Killing Her Son, Granddaughter

lead_paragraph: Suburban Detroit authorities have filed first-degree murder charges against a 65-year-old woman they say slashed her son's throat and then fatally beat her 7-month-old granddaughter.
